physical_examinations.vital_signs: Weight: 33.7 kg (>99.9th percentile; z score, 7.2), Height: 93.5 cm (69.1st percentile; z score, 0.5), Body-mass index: 38.6 (>99.9th percentile; z score, 5.8)
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Food-seeking behavior, hyperphagia evidenced by consuming 680 kcal in an ad libitum test breakfast. Normal blood T-lymphocyte counts: 3761 per cubic millimeter, CD4+â€“CD8+ ratio: 1.7.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially presented with high weight and BMI; during treatment with metreleptin, rapid normalization of eating behavior and weight loss was observed.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Severe pneumonia leading to two intensive care hospitalizations.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Progressive decrease in circulating levels of leptin during therapy with metreleptin, reflecting a negative energy balance.
